EmailTemplate.name: Everbank Falcon Winner.Winner Announcement
EmailTemplate.subject: Congratulations, Josh: The LEGO Falcon Is Yours.
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<http://www.vmturbo.com?utm_source=vmturbo&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=header> Congrats, Josh! The Winner, You Are. Dear Josh, Thank you for registering for VMTurbo's Everbank webinar. As you know, you were entered to win a LEGOTM Millennium Falcon upon registering, and we have great news. You won! Please click the link below to contact Jenny Sharpe <mailto:jennifer.sharpe@vmturbo.com> at VMTurbo, who will coordinate shipping your Falcon. We hope you will join us tomorrow for our webinar with Travelport, at which we will raffle-off a Combat CreaturesTM AttacknidsTM StryderTM. Congratulations, sir! Claim Your Falcon <mailto:jennifer.sharpe@vmturbo.com> Downloads White Papers Products 500 Boylston Street, Eighth Floor, Boston, MA 02116 Tel: 866.634.5087
